snippet: A Federal Reserve report said rising home sales helped increase home prices in most regions.
abstract: Survey of regional economic conditions in Federal Reserve's 12 districts finds rising home sales helped bolster growth in most regions of the country.
lead_paragraph: A Federal Reserve report said rising home sales helped increase home prices in most regions.

headline.seo: Fed Reports Economic Growth in Most Regions of the United States
headline.main: U.S. Economy Gets a Lift From the Housing Markets
headline.print_headline: U.S. Economy Gets a Lift From the Housing Markets
